title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, enabling programmatic chat, generate, and embedding calls with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, file uploads, and role management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating local Ollama models into Rails or plain Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (terminal UI) client for Ollama with conversation history and keyboard shortcuts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama providing strongly-typed chat, generate, and embedding APIs with dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that registers Ollama models as both generators and embedders for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Collection of ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks pairing Ollama with Postgres/pgvector, LibreChat, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of community Modelfiles for CodeLlama, Llava, Mistral, StarCoder, and fine-tuned variants.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB with a Gradio UI for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node that integrates Ollama chat and embeddings into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot boilerplate that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model behind the firewall.
